adrFormatAddress: 307 E 89th St G, New York, NY 10128-5008, USA

originalText.text:
I lived in an Eric Goodman Realty property for 2 years, and I have absolutely no complaints. The office + the super were fast to reply to anything I needed, and they were so kind always.

If I ever move back to NYC, I'll want to rent with them again. They're some of the few honest realtors in New York!

If I ever move back to NYC, I'll want to rent with them again. They're some of the few honest realtors in New York!

originalText.text: Goodman is the best Real Estate company I ever worked with. The owners and staff are the best. Their knowledge and experience are key to helping anyone find an apartment. I will always use and recommend them whenever possible.

text.text: Goodman is the best Real Estate company I ever worked with. The owners and staff are the best. Their knowledge and experience are key to helping anyone find an apartment. I will always use and recommend them whenever possible.

originalText.text: I had a fantastic experience with Eric Goodman Realty. I lived in one of their buildings on the Upper West Side for 3 years. The team is very responsive and helpful. The building was kept clean and had everything I needed to feel comfortable.

text.text: I had a fantastic experience with Eric Goodman Realty. I lived in one of their buildings on the Upper West Side for 3 years. The team is very responsive and helpful. The building was kept clean and had everything I needed to feel comfortable.

originalText.text: Landlords in NYC can be a true nightmare, but Matt and the rest of the Goodman team are pleasant and accommodating. Leases and rent payments are nicely streamlined, and issues are always addressed with care and expediency.

text.text: Landlords in NYC can be a true nightmare, but Matt and the rest of the Goodman team are pleasant and accommodating. Leases and rent payments are nicely streamlined, and issues are always addressed with care and expediency.
